name: 4th ICSSAM International Conference on Social Science and Management
content: We are pleased to extend a cordial invitation to the 4th International Conference on Social Science and Management (ICSSAM), scheduled to take place from November 21st to November 23rd, 2024, in the vibrant city of Taipei, Taiwan. ICSSAM serves as a premier platform for scholars, researchers, and practitioners to convene and engage in meaningful discussions on the latest advancements, trends, and challenges in the fields of social science and management. Building upon the success of previous editions, ICSSAM 2024 promises to be an enriching and intellectually stimulating event.
